name: set_region_scroll_up
description: DECSTBM sets scroll region; SU scrolls only within region
comment: Row 0: A, Row 1: B, Row 2: C, Row 3: D, Row 4: E. Set scroll region 2;4 (rows 1-3 0-based). SU(1) scrolls region: C→row1, D→row2, row3 blank. Row 0 (A) and Row 4 (E) untouched. Then CUP(1,1) print X at (0,0).
